last_episode_to_air.name: Death, The Final Frontier
last_episode_to_air.overview: Strongman gets weak in the knees; a tease gets stoned; a flirty husband falls for a chain saw; a drunk wife crashes a sobriety party; a garage sale turns deadly; a flasher exposes his weakness; pot user goes brain dead.

name: 1000 Ways to Die
overview: The science of living and the randomness of death are combined with a dash of Darwinism. Forensic experts, pathologists, toxicologists, herpetologists, and other experts offer eloquent explanations of mortality.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The second season features more of the bizarre ways these unfortunates have met their maker, including suffocating in a Murphy bed, exploding breast implants and choking to death on edible panties.

episodes.name: Unforced Errors
episodes.overview: A young beauty works out a fantasy; an attorney jumps out a window; a helium-filled death trap.

episodes.name: Death Over Easy
episodes.overview: A fetish orgy and some grizzly realizations; a dozing beauty and a fire-breathing midget.

episodes.name: Dead and Deader
episodes.overview: A man has a reaction to a rubber suit.

episodes.name: Death Gets Busy
episodes.overview: A man accidentally takes a bath in acid; a super model eats herself to death; an exploding tire.

episodes.name: The Lighter Side of Death
episodes.overview: A farm hand gets into trouble with the farmer's daughter; raw snails; a magician bites the bullet.

episodes.name: The Good, The Bad, and the Dead
episodes.overview: A survivalist has a run in with snakes; a shoplifter jumps in a dumpster.

episodes.name: Death Be Not Stupid
episodes.overview: A narcoleptic falls asleep on the job; a biker drinks gasoline; a couple die after making love.

episodes.name: Cure for the Common Death
episodes.overview: The decision by a couple of Ozzy Osborne fans to snort fire ants ends poorly. July 4th reveler does more drinking than thinking - a homemade firecracker takes his head off. For two rock fans, an air guitar duel gets them too much air.

episodes.name: Death: A User's Manual
episodes.overview: An overeater goes belly up; a body builder juices and loses; a young couple text themselves to death.

episodes.name: I See Dead People (and they're cracking me up)
episodes.overview: A fatal colonic; a delayed reaction to death; a hot dog thief chokes to death.

episodes.name: Death On Arrival
episodes.overview: A drunk man literally slides into death, a game of Russian Roulette has an unusual twist and a boy band's swan song ends with a swan dive.

episodes.name: Death Bites!
episodes.overview: Russian mobsters share their last drink, a blonde bombshell literally lights up the night and a nature lover ends up joining the dead animal friend she tried to save.

episodes.name: Up With Death
episodes.overview: A meth addict bites off more than he can chew, the sorority girl from hell gets sucked down into it and a young couple share their last kiss.

episodes.name: Putting a Happy Face on Death
episodes.overview: Two con men get blown away, a sushi chef becomes the butt of a joke and the deadly consequences of porn addiction.

episodes.name: Bringing in the Dead
episodes.overview: A drug runner gets a heads up, a glutton goes belly up, a man-baby gets timed out, a nature hater gets turtle waxed, two stoners get bonged, a woman gets down and dirty and a man-hater gets feminated.

episodes.name: Gratefully Dead
episodes.overview: A exhibitionist gets the shock of his life, a death that's literally hard to swallow & a street ball player gets some deadly hang time.

episodes.name: Come On Get Deathy
episodes.overview: An amateur car customer gets swept away, a cheapskate gets what he paid for and a real estate deal goes up in flames.

episodes.name: Death Watch
episodes.overview: A hunter becomes the game, a soccer fan blows himself out and a crack addicted couple's world comes crashing down.

episodes.name: Waking Up Dead
episodes.overview: A clumsy salesman burns out, a phony priest sees the gets sent to Kingdom Come and a when man does his own version of "Man vs. Wild", wild wins.

episodes.name: You're dead! LOL!
episodes.overview: Death in the 70's! A mean girl gets a chubby bunny, a juicer gets juiced, a thief bites his tongue and  a biker boy craps out.

episodes.name: Dead to Rights
episodes.overview: A low rider gets crushed; nun chucks take out a dummy; Big Foot gets the boot; a case of spy vs. die; bikini girl swallows the wrong thing; a jockey gets thrown; an adult clown gets deep throated.

episodes.name: Dead on Dead
episodes.overview: A geek has his revenge against a jock, the deadly results from a corset and a British torturer comes up with an idea for a man that's too tall for the rack.

episodes.overview: An amateur car customer gets swept away, a cheapskate gets what he paid for and a real estate deal goes up in flames.

episodes.overview: A hunter becomes the game, a soccer fan blows himself out and a crack addicted couple's world comes crashing down.

episodes.name: Young, Dumb and Full of Death
episodes.overview: A clumsy salesman burns out, a phony priest sees the gets sent to Kingdom Come and a when man does his own version of "Man vs. Wild", wild wins.

episodes.overview: Death in the 70's! A mean girl gets a chubby bunny, a juicer gets juiced, a thief bites his tongue and a biker boy craps out.

episodes.name: Cure for the Common Death Pt. II
episodes.overview: A low rider gets crushed; nun chucks take out a dummy; Big Foot gets the boot; a case of spy vs. die; bikini girl swallows the wrong thing; a jockey gets thrown; an adult clown gets deep throated.

episodes.name: Sudden Death
episodes.overview: A geek has his revenge against a jock, the deadly results from a corset and a British torturer comes up with an idea for a man that's too tall for the rack.

episodes.name: Dying to Tell the Story
episodes.overview: A spoiled man learns the hard way to not fall asleep in the middle of Africa, an Amish man and a southern couple die sipping on the good stuff and in a battle of man against computer, the computer wins.

episodes.name: If You're Dead - Leave a Message and We'll Get Back to You
episodes.overview: The origin of the phrase "Mad as a Hatter", a criminal's cries for help literally fall on deaf ears and a con artist who intentionally injures himself ends up getting a much worse unintentional injury.

episodes.name: The One About Dumb People Dying!
episodes.overview: A cremator gets creamed, Two luggage thieves steal the wrong bag and a pumpkin thief gets gourd and many other bizarre stories.

episodes.name: Getting a Rise from the Dead
episodes.overview: A sign spinner who picks a deadly way to flip his sign, a sneaky sous chef who picks the wrong place to hide from other staff and a mob hit by two mobsters that goes very wrong.

episodes.name: Ready or Not, Here Comes Death
episodes.overview: A Japanese game show contestant dives down but comes up dead, a parkour enthusisast takes an unhealthy leap and two drunk hunters finding out that dynamite usage can be hazardous to one's health.

episodes.name: Grave Errors
episodes.overview: A hairstylist discovering drugs and alcohol while working can be deadly, a pair of female con artists who find going into a flooded basement can be shocking and a cell phone addict meeting her end in a move theater.

episodes.name: Killing Them Softly
episodes.overview: A Nigerian scam artist who winds up on the wrong end of his latest con, a grave robber who falls victim to the graveyard surroundings and an ex-Nazi who falls victim to delayed justice.

episodes.name: Better Them Than Us
episodes.overview: A theater owner finding out that flying can lead to the final curtain call, a Russian who gets death from above and a Revolutionary war setting with explosive results for one man.

episodes.name: Dead Before They Know It
episodes.overview: A girl takes cream from an unaware roommate with deadly consequences, two Sudanese thieves get death from high in the sky and a holiday mall Santa who ends the season on an icy point.

episodes.name: Stupid Is as Death Does
episodes.overview: A drunk sitting in an old pilot's seat gets fatally launched, teenagers in a drinking game find smoking and booze can be deadly and a video game addict learns the hard way that long term playing can lead to a real life "game over".

episodes.name: Mister Death
episodes.overview: A football player's odd place for storing his gun has deadly results, a terrorist escapes only for his method of escaping leads to his demise and a bank robber losing his head during the attempted theft.

episodes.name: Death, The New Black
episodes.overview: A disco dancer takes a fatal spin on the dance floor, a sauna contest has deadly results for the last contestant and an obnoxious drunk meets a heavy end at a plus sized beauty pageant.

episodes.name: Death Be a Lady Tonight
episodes.overview: An obnonoxious man steals a cab ride and gets cut down literally, an unhinged woman learns there is a fatal way to stalk her ex and terrorists find out that death can come from an unseen enemy.

episodes.name: Today’s Special: Death
episodes.overview: A woman who lied about her welding experience gets an explosive payback, a Prohibition era gunman finds a steamy bath house room is not the place to pull a gun and a right wing political activist makes a fatal point.

episodes.name: Eat, Pray Die
episodes.overview: A Dark Ages witch hunter meets death by stones, a juvenile delinquent fools around with a piece of farm equipment with fatal results and a drunk at a bachelor party receives a sharp and fatal blow.

episodes.name: Wait, Don't Tell Me – You’re Dead!
episodes.overview: A neo-nazi opens up a can of whoop ass, an epileptic stripper goes lights out, a poser diver washes out, a bunch of drug smugglers get caught red handed, a voyeur gets hood winked, a stalker gets shafted and a prankster’s prank backfires.

episodes.name: Death - The Gift That Lasts Forever
episodes.overview: A cheatin' hubby gets eaten by a bear, an old pervert sex-plodes, a bride goes down at the altar, a package gets an anthrax surprise, an insomniac commits a hit and run, a bearded hipster drowns and a drunk worker's pants explode.

episodes.name: Death: One Size Fits All
episodes.overview: A bakery worker, a coal miner, an oil wrestler and a driving instructor meet untimely demises.

episodes.name: Deadliest Kitsch
episodes.overview: Dictator gets stuck; securtiy guard gets hosed; rock climber falls; cyclist runs out of breath; circus clown meets an insane posse.

episodes.name: Grave Decisions
episodes.overview: Politico has a sneezing fit; a gun toting man blows up; a dirty biker gets justice; camper boils over with love.

episodes.name: Dirt Nap
episodes.overview: A bank robber sticks his neck out for a friend, red head gets taken down, a badass teen meets a mail box, a sheister shopper takes a dip, a fat man loses face, and a fart that kills.

episodes.name: Death Takes a Vacation
episodes.overview: Food trucker gets fried; chemical engineer gets burned; drug dealer goes for a trip; mime is silenced.

episodes.name: Wild Wild Death
episodes.overview: An inside job sucks the air out of a room; a superhero tries to fly; girl wants to strangle her boss.

episodes.name: Death Penalties
episodes.overview: Wedding singer gets choked up, muscle bound woman meets her maker, wanna be chef loses face, french maid gets stuck on iron maiden, mugger spills own guts, a "winning" tv star gets cancelled.

episodes.name: Die-abestic
episodes.overview: A lady puckers up one last time, a tow truck driver becomes a head banger, a waitress gets a bad tip, a food critic forgets the point, turkey gets hit with a turkey, neck massager takes a woman’s breath away, a dancer loses heart.

episodes.name: Star Death: The Last Generation
episodes.overview: Cat Lady’s love goes too fur, a burglar falls for his victim, a mob boss is given the finger, a nasty supermodel is given a dead eye, a customer is left breathless by great savings, a guy rolls over the point.

episodes.name: Death – Putting the “Fun” in “Funeral”
episodes.overview: Trainer and barbells meet, a polygamist falls for his own trap, lady misses the point of marriage, a couple wine and die, cable thief gets screwed, ticket scalper doesn't beat a light, dodgeballer has to dodge more than balls.

episodes.name: Sor-Dead Affair
episodes.overview: A man sexes up a statue, a sleep walker goes for a swim, hot headed swimming instructor gets over heated, bad parrot sitter takes a fall, rioter gets the wind knocked out of him, and a man dies with a happy ending.

episodes.name: Locked and Low Dead
episodes.overview: Socialite goes green, man with short fuse finally blows, woman high jumps to her death, crooked cop has the smell of decay, a wormy scam artist, trippy trip to the market, lame mad scientist gets burned.

episodes.name: Enter the Ferret
episodes.overview: A fat man squeezes into a baby swing; a female boxer goes down; a stoner gets launched; bad man takes an acid bath; a food fight turns deadly; a tattoo artist swallows a chain; a ferret goes up the eerie canal.

episodes.name: Think Globally, Die Locally
episodes.overview: A Chinese rapper gets grilled; a mini-golfer maxes out; a super lotto winner goes super nuts; a yoga teacher is a real gas; hipster goes down in slo-mo; a hacker gets hacked; a warden can't lock it down.

episodes.name: Tweets from the Dead
episodes.overview: A bug hater bugs out; a wedding crasher cuts loose; a street vendor lights up; a hijacker fights inflation; a thief gets a meat beat down; a ghost hunter gets spooked.

episodes.name: A New App Called Death
episodes.overview: A bicycle hater gets drilled; dummy tries to milk a pig; a diva gets winded; a scavenger loses his head; an office tart breaks the copy machine; motel inspector wakes up dead.

episodes.name: Death Certificates
episodes.overview: A fitness instructor gets bounced; a bird smuggler gets the flu; coke mules get branded; husband and wife take a hit; computer thief crashes and burns; moonshiner gets poked; a director makes a scene.

episodes.name: Crying Over Spilled Blood
episodes.overview: Tennis brat gets the shaft; a sadistic bank loan officer; a dead-eye sniper; a tourist eats a ghost chili; a deadly infomercial; a jail break gone wrong; a cave man discovers fire.

episodes.name: It's a Dead, Dead, Dead World
episodes.overview: Lazy husband goes on a roll; terrorists get gas; a survivalist doesn’t; urine big trouble; germaphobe takes a deadly bath; little person-big death; death on the jersey shore.

episodes.name: Death, The Final Frontier
episodes.overview: Strongman gets weak in the knees; a tease gets stoned; a flirty husband falls for a chain saw; a drunk wife crashes a sobriety party; a garage sale turns deadly; a flasher exposes his weakness; pot user goes brain dead.
